Articles.Content: what settings do i need to change to get the storage fairing thing?

On the fairing base, right-click (PAW menu) Interstage Nodes select ON and you'll have as many nodes as the size of the fairing allows. If you turn off Truss Structure (same PAW) the nodes are available but whatever you attach to them "floats" until you release themn after deploying the fairing. If you turn ON Truss Structure, you'll have actual hardware appear that will interact with whatever you attach to the nodes.

Edited August 29, 2020 by Wobbly Av8r
First, you need to go into Settings, and activate the "Show Advanced Tweakables" button. Then, as Wobbly Av8r said, use the Interstage Nodes button on the fairing.
